info.en: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, eggs, onions, olives, bell peppers, tomatoes, and oregano.

info.en: Mozzarella, chopped banana, condensed milk, and ground cinnamon.

info.es: Salsa de tomate, mozzarella, pollo desmenuzado, requesón y orégano.

info.en: Mixed greens, sliced tomatoes, pickles, onions, white cheese, and croutons with lemon dressing.

info.en: Shredded chicken soup with carrots and herbs in chicken broth.

info.es: Crema de vegetales compuesta por papa, cebolla, tomates, puerro, apio y nabo; perfecta para dietas.

info.en: Cream of vegetables made with potatoes, onions, tomatoes, leeks, celery, and turnip; perfect for diets.
